attributes.action: Stop Gordon Brown becoming Prime Minister by Default
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's pretty much a for gone conclusion that Gordon Brown will become Prime Minister on 27th June 2007 when Tony Blair steps down.

I say that a General Election is called on 27th June, to decide who runs this country, and not given to someone by default.

rejection.details:
Someone beat you to it...
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NotBrown/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
